rules_text:
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Fleshbearer this turn dies, integrate that creature. [i](Exile it, then you may choose a nonland permanent it’s integrated onto.)[/i]
Fleshbearer gets +2/+0 and has menace as long as a creature card is integrated onto it.
notes:
!canoncard Underdark Explorer
 101: Integrating is now optional.
